body.name: Mattel Disney Pixar The Incredibles Mr. Incredible Action Figure 8-in Tall, Highly Posable in Blue Glory Days Suit, Authentic Detail, Movie Toy for Collectors & Kids
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 24 mins
features: Recreate the superhero fun of Disney and Pixar The Incredibles with this Mr. Incredible character figure.
He stands 8 inches (20.3 cm) tall and features multiple joints for dynamic posing -- recreate scenes from the movie or imagine new ones!
Designed with true-to-movie detail, Mr. Incredible figure wears his Glory Days blue super suit designed by the ever-fabulous Edna Mode.
Collectors can add this fan-favorite figure to their showcases to mix and match with Pixar action figures from movies past and present -- and find others to expand their collection even more!
Makes a fun movie-themed toy for action figure enthusiasts and Pixar fans ages 3 years old and up.
body.description: Explore the world of Pixar with this high-quality, posable action figure of a beloved movie character from Disney and Pixar The Incredibles Mr. Incredible! Multiple movable joints and movie-authentic details allow kids and collectors to duplicate signature moves and dynamic poses from the film and imagine their own. With so many fan-favorite characters to find, kids can have an expansive Pixar play world and collectors can create a unique showcase display! makes a great toy for Pixar fans ages 3 years and older. Includes one character figure. Colors and decorations may vary.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adventures with Pixar With toys, figures and role-play items from Mattel, kids of all ages can recreate Pixar movie adventures and discover a wide world of imagination. Welcome to the world of Pixar. Explore!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Guaranteed to please the most distinguished of body builders or giggles among us!
reviews.reviewText: SUCH a cute, funny, fellow! (He really is pretty enchanting, especially if you got to know the character in recent decades)! I found this marked down, and as such, it's been a terrific addition to some of our Operation Christmas Child shoeboxes this year, now at the beginning of their journey to make many children unfamiliar with Western expectations and understanding of our rather (!!) materialistic culture. Guaranteed to please in almost any case, I'd think, and definitely good for a chuckle for the uhm...maturing dads attempting to fit in yesteryear's suit! Grin. The only downfall I can see was pointed out by sophomore in HS as he helped pack. "With all those big muscles, the poor guy can't flex!" True if you're focusing on the physics of the thing. But charming nonetheless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Give Mr. Incredible to the right Mr. Incredible and then laugh about it!
reviews.reviewText: This action figure is very popular with young boys and older boys that could use the influence of Mr. Incredible and was recently the big hit of 2 different birthday parties of grown men who received Mr. Incredible as an award!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OG Mr Incredible
reviews.reviewText: My son (4 w/Autism) loves all things Disney and Pixar so when I see figurines and other toys I just want to get him all the things, maybe it’s because I never had them or was able to… I literally am amazed at how well the toys are from Amazon. Absolutely recommend.
